tracks.text: Bandai Namco
Bandai Namco Filmworks
Kodansha
Guard swings. Haga blocks
Guard swings. Haga dodges and steps back. Guard swings, Haga keeps distance.
Amano rushes in
Haga kicks the guard in the head.
Cubes float in blue streams of light.
The light eminates from a stone tablet.
Red and black text appears. Quality Assurance in Another World. The text becomes grainy and glitches.
Haga presses his hands against a stone wall.
He pulls out a pad of paper and writes.
Nikola carries boxes near a tent.
She trips, dropping papers. She gets up, dirt smudging her face.
Amano sits at a desk. Papers with sketches hang on a nearby wall.
He presents the papers to a girl with short green hair, sitting in a bed.
A silver haired elf slices meat. She turns, holding plates of food.
Tesla, glowing, floats in the stream of blue.
Light passes over the Play-Ing Inc group, including Sakai and Sumida. The Boss stands alone.
A black knight with a green cape and broadsword walk through a barren land.
A small man sits in a glowing pod, surrounded by a nest of wires.
The small man transforms into Haga.
Amano puts his hands on the ground and glows green.
Haga races past the glow, knife in hand.
A kitra swipes at him. He leaps back, and the elf leaps over him, coming down with a broadsword.
She slices through a Kitra's right arm.
A variety of monsters approach. Nikola stands alone, mouth open.
Blue light erupts, knocking back the monsters.
A dragon roars. The elf, Amano, Haga, and Nikola look up at it.
Haga tenses
Montage of character faces, including Haga's party. Nikola is consumed in flames. Haga reaches out into white light while screaming.
A platform sits in a rectangular pool in a dark stone room. A green diamond sits in a library. A king is flanked by a man and a rabbit woman.
Haga and party look at a village from a cliff. A tablet sits on a desk.
The guard lies face down on a bloody floor.
Text appears. Number 6, The Mad King
Haga reviews
They walk down a corridor
Defeat Kitra and Escape
They enter a large room with a channel of water running through
A muscular, humanoid monster with tusks swipes stands in front of them, as tall as the room. It has a vertical mouth full of teeth, and tiny, cute eyes.
It's tethered by a chain. It reaches out with hands the size of Haga, but the trio is too far away.
Nikola apprehensive, picks up a stick near Kitra
Kitra rears its head
It blows a gust that knocks Nikola over.
She flies into Amano, and they get pushed back to the edge of the water channel.
The edge crumbles. Amano and Nikola fall in.
Haga dives in
He surfaces with the two
The channel races them towards an exit
He tosses the 2 out of the channel.
We swims rapidly upstream.
He lies on the stone, soaking wet.
He spots a missing ceiling tile.
In a dark room, Sakai stabs a vampire while a woman sits nearby.
Sakai stops stabbing. The woman pours blood in the vampire's mouth, but it overflows.
In the boss room, Kitra watches as Haga mixes materials.
Pink incense rises
Kitra sleeps
Haga scales the wall behind Kitra
She backs up towards the channel
Kitra sleeps in front of about 20 jars, connected by lines to a lit candle.
They climb a rope into the ceiling
In a crawl tunnel, Haga hands Nikola a lit candle.
She tries to stand and hits her head.
The trio crawls
In a room full of large jars
There's a narrow path between the jars, which are bigger than Nikola
Amano knocks one. He catches it, but it cracks into another, which breaks.
The jar disappears, revealing a human sized Kitra.
More jars open
Revealing more Kitras
They appraoch
Amano runs. Haga and Nikola look up at the oncoming Kitra hoard

Now Loading... Fether. A race of beastfolk who can see in the dark. They live mainly on the small island in the northeast of Clayborne, where they trade with the continent using their excellent navigation skills.
Now Loading... Gust. The mot basic spirit magic. Uses the power of wind spirits to summon a blast of air. Does no direct damage, but can be surprisingly useful depending on the situation and terrain.
The tusked, muscular humanoids approach while squeaking
They knock over more jars as they run
More kitras appear
A kitra blocks their path
Haga punches a jar
He breaks more
The Kitras open their vertical mouths, revealing rows of teeth
They're surrounded
A kitra reaches out to Amano
The hand pauses and its image stutters
Nikola turns in slow, stuttering motions
Lagging, Nikola avoids limbs and runs
Ahead of the Kitra, Nikola stumbles
Haga grabs her
The Kitra run, mouth wide
And slam into a wall
Tusks chomp and at the entrance to a crawl tunnel. The trio pant inside.
Sakai strings up a vampire while 3 people talk to him
Amano runs towards a hallway while Haga and Nikola climb up through the floor.
Haga and Amano look at each other
They walk forward
They stop at a door
Amano peers through. A ray of moonlight shines into the center of the room, spotlighting a kneeling knight in all black armor.
The trio become invisible and enter the room.
They slowly creep past the knight
The knight strikes a broadsword against the ground.
Now visible, Haga pulls out daggers
The knight swings the sword onto the ground. The force of the swing throws Haga against the wall. His buff dissipates.
The knight readies a swing. Haga, glowing green, blocks. The sword strikes, the green dissipates.
The Boss sits at a table at the head table in a banquet hall. Sakai stands behind him, with 6 others sitting nearby.
The knight lunges at Haga
A wind strike breaks the buff, and Haga flies back
The knight stops and stares. It's helmet is opaque, with 2 spikes on the side, and a yellow plume on the top. The knight reaches behind its back.
and vanishes
At the top of a tower, the trio enter a banquet hall
They close the chest
The candle burns faintly, then goes out
Near the large Kitra, jars light
The castle shakes.
Amano cracks open the chest.
Sakai and others stab the Boss
To be continued
Credits roll near stylized still drawings. Nikola carries a staff and walks ahead of Haga.
Amano, Haga, and Nikola stand in a mountainous area. Haga and holds a paper and quill. Nikola holds the same and watches Haga. Amano smiles.
Amano sits, holding papers with colorful rectangles. Nikola and Haga stand at the far side of the room, near windows.
Haga, Nikola, Amano, and a silver haired elf girl sit around a campfire, eating meat. The sun sets behind the woods surrounding them.
Nikola looks up, mouth open wide. A blue stream of light flickers and rises above her, shooting into the sky, until it explodes in fireworks.
Haga, Nikola, Amano, and the silver haired elf girl stare at the night sky over mountains. Nikola points at the blue firework, sparkling above them.
Nikola floats in the air, glowing purple, and holding a wooden staff.
Haga, Amano, and the silver haired elf stand in a lit, green grove. Nikola runs to them as Amano waves.
